name: Sprint4
description: Project Description: All of the features on the UI are organized into one panel on the left side. The panel can also be hidden with the hide button to provide more canvas space. Once the UI is hidden the instruction still stay on the page, in case the user forgets. In addition, the feature changes, like changing size or color, take place for all current and future paint strokes allowing for more customization. Lastly, there are 7 different hotkeys. Keys 1-3 change animation type, keys 4-7 change the prefab types.
